desc: Our mission is to make Adult More Fun with our candy for grown-ups. Eat Your Drink™ with the world-first Alcoholic Cocktail Gummies made with high quality spirits, 5% ABV and fruit blends. Shop Alcohol-free Cocktail Candy and Drink Mixers and explore our brand experiences.

layout.text: It's officially summer ☀️ We’ve picked a few of our favorite fruity cocktails and wrapped them up in our beautiful, giftable summer themed boxes.
